scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy ; docker build -t rrc-backstage-screenshoot-report . ; docker tag rrc-backstage-screenshoot-report:$PKG_VERSION 354821401994.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/rrc-backstage-screenshoot-report:$PKG_VERSION; docker push 354821401994.dkr.ecr.ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com/rrc-backstage-screenshoot-report:$PKG_VERSION
scripts.kill:8080: pkill -15 -f -o bin/nodemon;kill $(lsof -i:8080 -sTCP:LISTEN -t);echo All dev-server should be killed
